Dialogue.Page: SV: This is South Village, do you read me North Village?
NV: Hearing you loud and clear South Village!
SV: Our climatologists have collected some very concerning data, this winter was colder than average, but the westerlies haven't responded normally.
SV: Normally the westerlies counteract radical temperature shifts, but they haven't this time.
SV: This coming winter could be even colder than the last one.
NV: That is very bad, we barely survived this winter.
SV: There's more, you should send someone here to take a look at this data.
NV: Will do, thanks for the information South Village, stay safe out there. North Village out.
SV: You too. South Village out.
